Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Foundation — scaffold, design system, layout, routing, stores

- Scaffold Vite + React + TypeScript project
- Configure Tailwind CSS with NexusTradr design tokens \(colors, fonts, shadows, glassmorphism\)
- Set up path aliases \(@/ -> src/\)
- Create full TypeScript type system \(8 type files covering all data models\)
- Create utility library \(cn helper, motion variants, formatters, constants\)
- Create 8 Zustand stores with complete mock data matching PRD screenshots
- Create 6 mock data files \(portfolio, trades, markets, traders, alerts, FAQ\)
- Create 5 custom hooks \(animated counter, media query, debounce, localStorage, intersection observer\)
- Create 11 shared components \(GlassCard, PageWrapper, StatCard, PillBadge, AnimatedCounter, SearchInput, ToggleGroup, LiveIndicator, SkeletonLoader, EmptyState, ConfirmDialog\)
- Create 5 layout components \(MainLayout, Sidebar, Header, TickerBar, Breadcrumbs\)
- Create 10 page stubs with PageWrapper transitions
- Set up React Router with lazy loading and AnimatePresence page transitions
- Add Google Fonts \(Inter, JetBrains Mono, Space Grotesk\)
- Add CSS animations \(ticker scroll, shimmer, neon pulse, price flash\)
- Zero TypeScript errors, clean production build \(133KB gzipped\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
